price: Por certo, aqueles, contra os quais a palavra de teu Senhor se cumpriu, não crerão.
arabic: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ حَقَّتۡ عَلَيۡهِمۡ كَلِمَتُ رَبِّكَ لَا يُؤۡمِنُونَ

version.title: Portuguese Translation - Helmy Nasr
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Portugal by Dr. Helmy Nasr. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center -1440.

meta.transliteration: inna alladhīna ḥaqqat ʿalayhim kalimatu rabbika lā yu'minūna
